Overview.Title: Classify each vehicle to a category for the marked object in the image
Overview.Text: You are helping to classify vehicles in an image. Each sub-image contains marked object and needs to be selected with appropriate labels

List.ListItem: Refer the categories definitions when deciding appropriate labels : https://mturk-s3-cg.s3.amazonaws.com/Classes-Definitions.pdf Definitions of Classes : Guidelines for each class
Each question contains an image marked with single object. The marked objects in each image need to be labelled to appropriate category from the listed categoreis.
Text description of each category is as follows
"Small" - includes cars, SUVs, cars, Sedan, pickup trucks, station wagon, minivan, Coupe, Microcar, Hatchback
"VanRV" - includes vans, RVs, Motorhomes, camper vans
"Trucks" - includes Large trucks, trucks with attached trailers
"Specialized" - the vehicles such as tractors, plows, balers or any vehicle that has special function such as cement mixing vehicle
"Small trailers" - includes small trailers such as caravans, popup campers
"Large trailers" - trailers that are large -both loaded or unloaded. (relative to adjacent vehicle/objects sizes).
"Unknown" - such as it might just be significant to note it is a vehicle close to one of above classes but not significant enough to classify to a specific vehicle class.
Vehicles that should be marked as "not relevant" if it is a motorbike, motorcyles/bicycles, Golf carts, sprinklers

QuestionContent.Text: Have you read the Instructions given above ?

Selection.Text: yes
no

QuestionContent.Text: What class of vehicle does following marked vehicle belong to ?

Selection.Text: "Bus" - includes all buses, school buses
"Small" - includes cars, SUVs, cars, Sedan, pickup trucks, station wagon, minivan, Coupe, Microcar, Hatchback
"Specialized" - the vehicles such as tractors, plows, balers or any vehicle that has special function such as cement mixing vehicle
"Large trailers" - trailers that are large -both loaded or unloaded. (relative to adjacent vehicle/objects sizes).
"Small trailers" - includes small trailers such as caravans, popup campers
"Trucks" - includes Large trucks, trucks with attached trailers
"van_rv" - includes vans, RVs, Motorhomes, camper vans
"Unknown" - such as it might just be significant to note it is a vehicle close to one of above classes but not significant enough to classify to a specific vehicle class.
Vehicles that should be marked as "not relevant" if it is a motorbike, motorcyles/bicycles, Golf carts, sprinklers etc

QuestionContent.Title: Understanding categories definitions of objects to be classified

List.ListItem: Your answers will be automatically assessed, and if you get at least 85% of the questions correct, you will receive the payment. And you can proceed and find image classification HITs by "Test MTurk User".
You agree to follow guidelines and classes definitions for doing the image classification tasks.
If you do not get enough questions correct, you will not be able to re-take this test for 24 hours.

Selection.Text: Yes I have read and agree to submit my results.
No I have not read.
